thread.section_title: LiftMode Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LiftMode | liftmode.com
thread.title: Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text: Excellent products at a great value. One product in particular for my wife and one for me. Theonine helps my menapausal wife sleep, and huperzine relieves depression of 20 yrs. for me. Almost a miracle as I have used and use a lot of antidepressants including now. But huperzine improves my outlook and mood , side effect free. But as a cautionary not, do not take too much. The dosage recommended is correct. No more. Steve
